full_summary:
## W3934-22C227 RFSO - Aircraft Repair Services - RFQ

### Details

| **Trade Agreements** | Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA), Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA), ... (18 trade agreements in total) |

### Procurement Overview
The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) on behalf of the Department of National Defence (DND) invites qualified contractors to submit a contract for the provision of aircraft repair services for the Regional Cadet Support Units (RCSU) in Saint-Jean, Quebec, Canada.

The solicitation is based on a Request for Standing Offer (RFSO) with a division into Lots. The contract will be awarded based on the lowest price.

### Important Dates

* Publication Date: 2022-09-13
* Tender Closing Date: 2022-10-12T14:00:00
* Expected Contract Start Date: 2022-10-25
* Expected Contract End Date: 2024-10-25

### Ends

To obtain more information, please contact Caty Melanie at melanie.caty@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca. The RFQ can be accessed through Ariba via: [http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/14091197?extsite=MTQwOTExOTdfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/14091197?extsite=MTQwOTExOTdfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==) 

Please note that the link provided requires signing in using an A
